title: Was a 14 suspension really necessary.
body:
I was suspended for basically for 14 days for saying kys twice maybe i was being little mean and insensitive i get that but i had no previous penalty's before this ever besides dodging and getting a Que timer, i don't know if you even counts those but i am level 136 and have about over 500 hours on the game i try to play as much as possible until i get tilted to play a different game because i always get the worse team mates thank you match making . so my point i was rightfully punished but punished too much for what i did i would get a chat restriction and honor lock but 14 suspension for first time offense is way over the top and i am thinking of just never playing again here is the chat log.

Game 1
In-Game
CosmicKnight97: kat runes :(
CosmicKnight97: kys
CosmicKnight97: why would i do that
CosmicKnight97: also veigar is not  a supp
CosmicKnight97: no
CosmicKnight97: begone thots
CosmicKnight97: loosing to veigar early xd
CosmicKnight97: thx
CosmicKnight97: she just wouldent go in
CosmicKnight97: no f
CosmicKnight97: or r
CosmicKnight97: holoy shit
CosmicKnight97: u talking shit about me ekko lol ?
CosmicKnight97: u could have got her ;p
CosmicKnight97: oooh angry
CosmicKnight97: stop taking dumb fights monkey children
CosmicKnight97: ^
CosmicKnight97: xd
CosmicKnight97: she  has 50
CosmicKnight97: 56
CosmicKnight97: stop beating ur meat
CosmicKnight97: nice job dieing and getting nothing
CosmicKnight97: kys*
CosmicKnight97: XD
CosmicKnight97: new account time i guess
CosmicKnight97: worse possible out come i get chat restricted ?
Post-Game
CosmicKnight97: ww so uselss

replies.body:
Yes, you were even aware of what you said.
Definitely worth of 14-day ban.

I agree.

Permaban did fit better.


Ah..deserved

The reason you got a 14 day suspension instead of a lesser punishment, is that the offense was utterly unacceptable and that it fits under Riot's "zero tolerance" policy for hate speech and egregiously offensive/unacceptable communications. This falls under the latter of the two. Telling someone to cause harm to themselves or another is not acceptable outside the game, just as much as it is unacceptable inside the game.

Veigar is a support.

Veigar is definitely a support right now.

Also deserved. Next time you do anything remotely offensive you get permed. We dont need bronzekids who think they can tell their team how to play.

> CosmicKnight97: kys*
CosmicKnight97: XD
CosmicKnight97: new account time i guess

If you say something like that knowing full well it's punishment worthy then yes, a suspension is necessary.

The reason you got a 14-day ban is because you told people to kill themselves twice over the course of the game. This falls under the zero-tolerance policy and is grounds for an escalation because you shouldn't need a warning to know that that's unacceptable ever. Even if we ignore the kys's you show negative behavior throughout the game that continues even in the post game:

>CosmicKnight97: stop taking dumb fights monkey children
Post-Game
CosmicKnight97: ww so uselss

So like you said, the punishment is deserved. Next time if you must rage then do so at the screen instead of in the chat as that will allow you to vent your frustrations without compromising your teams chances of success.
Line 2 and the end zero tolerance rules that can skip CR lead to your 14 day ban.
be happy they didn't perm ban you from the get go

> CosmicKnight97: worse possible out come i get chat restricted ?

...

Well. You don't tell other to commit suicide. Due to that, your punishment was escelated to a 14 day ban.
